ADS.Text1: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory.
ADS.Text2: Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught. Playtime Co.
ADS.Text3: was once the king of the toy manufacturing industry... until everybody inside of the factory one day disappeared into thin air.
ADS.Text4: Now, years later, you must explore the abandoned factory and uncover the truth.
ADS.Text5: This includes the pufferpoppy's roll, the piranha's bite, the flying poppy's flight. There may be times where are stuck and don't know how to advance.
ADS.Text6: The toys of Playtime Co. are a lively bunch! From Bot to Huggy, Catbee to Poppy. This amazing GrabPack is a wearable backpack, accompanied by 2 artificial hands attached via a steel wire.
ADS.Text7: With this handy, state-of-the-art tool, there's no limit to what Playtime Co. The hands' powerful grip allows for the movement of heavy objects with ease!.
ADS.Text8: Rate Us 5 Stars And Download New and you can also find various VHS tapes lying around the factory, which gives a more in-depth explanation of the story
